src_text: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src_text: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.
ref_text: Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya Kɛlɛ waati la, jamanabolo tannisaba nunuw ye cɛmacɛ marabolo fɛgɛman dɔ sigi senkan—Bɛɛjɛ Sariyasenw hokumu kɔnɔn—Kurufanyɔya Sariyaseng kɔrɔ.
hyp_text: Dɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw, Bɔlɔlɔkɛnɔw sigira kɔnɔ, 13 kɔnɔw ye kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw sigira kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw tɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw sɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw, sɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw ye kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw tɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw, kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw ye kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw, sɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw ye kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw, kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw ye kɔnɔnɔkɛnɔw.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Nka, Belgique ani Suisse faransɛfɔlaw bena seka faransɛ nɔrɔmali kalan kalansola, ola u bena sek'i famuya ali nin i ye faransɛ nɔrɔmali jate cogoya itilize."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Siyɛkili tɛmɛlenw kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw ye jateminɛlila terasiw jɔw dugukolo jalen ani garonin sanfɛ fo kuluw la min ɲɛsinleno kɔkɔji ma."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Trans-Alaska ka nɛgɛburu-sira mayili 800 tun  datugura k'a sabu kɛ taji kɛnɛ bara ba camaw bɔnni ye, Fairbanks baniyan fan fɛ, Alasika."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Bɛliziki bi-sigiyɔrɔw tun yed Luxembourg fan dɔ ye fɔlɔ nka u kɛra Bɛliziki ta ye Bɛlizikikaw ka yɛlɛma kɔfɛ san 1830 kɔnɔ."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Kabi The Onion sigira senkan, a kɛra kunafonicariladegisoba ye ka fara bolonɔndilanso  ni bɔlɔlɔsoba minnu ye bɔlɔlɔbaarakɛra 5.000000 sama Ɔkutɔburu kalo la, o nin tɛ kelenamankutuw, tile Sangan 24 bɔlɔlɔkankunafoniw, bɔlɔlɔkanjɛmukanw, ni diɲɛɲɛdɔngafekura  ni o bɛ wele Our Dumb World la."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Siyɛkili tɛmɛlenw kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw ye jateminɛlila terasiw jɔw dugukolo jalen ani garonin sanfɛ fo kuluw la min ɲɛsinleno kɔkɔji ma."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Nka, Belgique ani Suisse faransɛfɔlaw bena seka faransɛ nɔrɔmali kalan kalansola, ola u bena sek'i famuya ali nin i ye faransɛ nɔrɔmali jate cogoya itilize."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Siyɛkili tɛmɛlenw kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw ye jateminɛlila terasiw jɔw dugukolo jalen ani garonin sanfɛ fo kuluw la min ɲɛsinleno kɔkɔji ma."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Trans-Alaska ka nɛgɛburu-sira mayili 800 tun  datugura k'a sabu kɛ taji kɛnɛ bara ba camaw bɔnni ye, Fairbanks baniyan fan fɛ, Alasika."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Bɛliziki bi-sigiyɔrɔw tun yed Luxembourg fan dɔ ye fɔlɔ nka u kɛra Bɛliziki ta ye Bɛlizikikaw ka yɛlɛma kɔfɛ san 1830 kɔnɔ."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Bambara]: {"translation": "Kabi The Onion sigira senkan, a kɛra kunafonicariladegisoba ye ka fara bolonɔndilanso  ni bɔlɔlɔsoba minnu ye bɔlɔlɔbaarakɛra 5.000000 sama Ɔkutɔburu kalo la, o nin tɛ kelenamankutuw, tile Sangan 24 bɔlɔlɔkankunafoniw, bɔlɔlɔkanjɛmukanw, ni diɲɛɲɛdɔngafekura  ni o bɛ wele Our Dumb World la."}
